review: I wish I could honestly "star" this item. I haven't been able to use it even once. I have the fire TV box at home and love it. When the fire stick came out I didn't hesitate to purchase. I travel for work so I'm gone more than I'm home and was thrilled to have a portable option that doesn't take up valuable packing space. So disappointed that it won't connect to public wi-fi that requires a log in. Amazon has put a one line blurb on the fire stick page saying they are working on it, but its been there for a while. If your looking for something to travel with, the fire TV stick is not it. I'm hoping its just a software update.
